amendment.description: Amendment increases Education for the Disadvantaged funding by $20 million and decreases Department of Education program administration funding accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds appropriated in the bill for Education for the Disadvantaged by approximately $40 million, and to reduce funds appropriated for the Department of Education's administrative accounts comensurately.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
